ing: 1 (6 ounce) container Key lime-flavored Greek yogurt
1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream, or more to taste
des: "I made this one morning looking for an untraditional flavor for a smoothie. It comes out smooth and creamy. Garnish with a lime wedge."
ins: Blend ice, yogurt, banana, cream, and orange juice together in a blender until smooth.
